Class SensitivityAtSpecificity: computes best sensitivity (true positive rate) given a minimum specificity (true negative rate). It uses thresholds to find point where specificity >= target, returns corresponding sensitivity. Handles sample weighting, optional class_id for multi-class. Configurable number of thresholds, dtype, name.

Business intent: Provide metric for evaluating binary classification models, especially when need to guarantee a minimum specificity (e.g., medical diagnostics) and assess sensitivity.
